full_summary:
### Hosting and Disaster Recovery Services for NEICS-NEXCOL
#### Tender Reference Number: cb-7621-1933829
#### Solicitation Number: 24-242593
#### Publication Date: 2023-07-26
#### Tender Closing Date: 2023-08-10T16:00:00

The government of Canada is seeking a contractor to provide Hosting and Disaster Recovery Services for NEICS-NEXCOL. The contract duration is expected to be 1 year.

**Description of the Requirement**
The contractor will be responsible for providing IT professional services to support the operations of the Data and Analytics Program at Global Affairs Canada. The services required include management advisory services, computer services, and systems architecture.

**Security Requirements**
The contractor must have a minimum corporate security required of SECRET and minimum resource security required of SECRET.

**Procurement Details**
The procurement method is competitive-selective tendering, and the contract will be awarded to the lowest price.

**Trade Agreements**
The procurement is covered by the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP), the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), the Agreement on Internal Trade (AIT), the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), the Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), and the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement (CPanFTA).

**Eligibility**
Any eligible bidder, subject to the solicitation requirements, is welcome to participate.

**Contact Information**
To access the tender documents, please visit https://canadabuys.canada.ca/. For any inquiries, please contact Houssam Hannat, Contracting Officer, at houssam.hannat@international.gc.ca or (343) 203-5473.

The procurement is subject to the Canada's Trade Agreement Act and other federal legislation and regulations. By participating in this procurement process, the bidders acknowledge that they have read, understood, and will comply with these requirements. 

**Addendum**
Please note that Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) Method of Supply is refreshed three (3) times per year. If you wish to find out how you can be a "Qualified SA Holder", please contact [email address].

This tender is now CLOSED. 
Please contact us if you need any further assistance or clarification.
